text: François Bourdoncle (born 1964) is founder and CEO of the search engine company Exalead. ==Literature== * Semantic Analysis of Interval Congruences, 1993, , Author François Bourdoncle, Springer-Verlag, London, UK. == Other websites == * www.exalead.com/Francois.Bourdoncle Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:French businesspeople
title: François Bourdoncle
